---

We are happy to announce the release of Persepolis Download Manager 4.2.0.

In this version:

1- You can import link(s) from clipboard. Copy your link(s) and select "import links from clipboard" from file menu. You can also use the system tray icon context menu as well.

![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/7452500/336321333-02a7c4dc-9e9e-4fa2-8e32-18588b65a841.jpg?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..Az0k5f3gcKcat-UeTsabL5_lLzjdf-KZEWPgb2fIG8c)

2- Also, Persepolis can automatically detect links in the clipboard. This feature is not active by default. You can enable this feature from the preferences window(Edit > Preferences > Preferences tab > check system clipboard for copied links). Persepolis can check the clipboard only when the main window is displayed.

![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/7452500/336322517-73294ef8-cce0-429e-9a1c-8646bf2e65aa.jpg?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..p1rPsQtqc6F6wyk098tAPq0lV8Ofhp5Tz33txO2xosk)

Of course, our advice is to use Persepolis browser extension instead of copying the link from the browser. Please checkout this link for more information.

![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/7452500/336147585-8c75fa8c-fba2-4bcb-afd9-931e07e7c1f6.jpg?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..Cj_0-bVNmkGm7NkxS6VCFXb3JeMBwrsZb2nDp6Hnb9c)

3- not finding the file name when adding a link is fixed.


4- Translations are updated.

Thanks to contributors for pull requests and bug reports!
Special thanks to [@amiraslanaslani](https://github.com/amiraslanaslani) and [@alireza-delavari](https://github.com/alireza-delavari)

Regards
AliReza AmirSamimi
